translations: 未切的；毛边的；未雕琢的；未割的

sentences.sentence: The uncut grass came up to her waist.
Trees were to be left uncut, roads unpaved.
sentences.translation: 树木未被修剪，道路未被铺设。

sentences.sentence: We saw the uncut version of "Caligula" when we were in Europe.
sentences.translation: 我们在欧洲时看了未剪辑版的“卡里古拉”。
